alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 12:11PM PST until January 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches in valley locations such as Susanville with 5 to 10 in the mountains, highest near and west of Highway 89. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to near whiteout conditions in snow and blowing snow. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be prepared for travel delays or adjust your travel plans to avoid periods of heavy snow and white out conditions. The latest road conditions can be found by checking with CalTrans.
